content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #95154 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
The sample code to reproduce seems to me simple enough to warrant a high/critical prioritization level. Author of the linked PR is already on it anyway so it's under control).

Unrelated: from time to time I check the tier platform support table, I was surprised to see Windows support is still tier 1 starting from Win7. Last discussion in T-compiler I know of happened last year (and related links)
I'll assign a P-high out of caution (and only for the record, since there is already a fix)
